category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_control_wildcard
preference.preference_description: Control the number of required characters before a wildcard character is allowed. The default is 0, which allows wildcard as the first character. For example, set to 2 means "AB*" is allowed and "A*" or "*" is not allowed. This is a site preference.
